title: Tank Nerfs
body:
You guys need to nerf some of the tank items, Just seeing tank ekko top has a 57% winrate you know something is wrong.
tank meta is really unfun in my opinion, ICEBORN AND FIRECAPES NERFS PLS

replies.body:
Nerfing tank items won't prevent tanky assassins from showing up in a meta at least not without gutting tanks as a whole. 

Simply put Tank Ekko is only viable for a few reasons, and its not solely tank items.
He has the following
A) Mobility to stick
B) High base damages
C)Multiple escapes
D) Grasp of the undying

This is what makes him viable as a tank.

Tank Sion main here, the tanks aren't the problem, it's your team not peeling them. I can't tell you how many times I have landed a fully charged Decimating Smash on 3 or more people because their frontline was busy 2v4ing. The frontline is shredded before the stun even wears off, creating a 5v3. If I was CC'd, that wouldn't happen. Same goes for Ekko, only a little easier to kill and harder to hit.
